member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE
member.summary: TheMIB_IPMCAST_MFE structure stores the information for an Internet Protocol (IP) Multicast Forwarding Entry (MFE).

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwGroup
member.summary: The range of IPv4 multicast groups for this MFE. A value of zero indicates a wildcard group.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwSource
member.summary: The range of IPv4 source addresses for this MFE. A value of zero indicates a wildcard source.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwSrcMask
member.summary: The IPv4 subnet mask that corresponds to dwSourceAddr. The dwSourceAddr and dwSourceMask members are used together to define a range of sources.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwUpStrmNgbr
member.summary: The upstream neighbor that is related to this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwInIfIndex
member.summary: The index of the interface to which this MFE is related.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwInIfProtocol
member.summary: The routing protocol that owns the incoming interface to which this MFE is related.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwRouteProtocol
member.summary: The client that created the route.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwRouteNetwork
member.summary: The IPv4 address associated with the route referred to by dwRouteProtocol.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwRouteMask
member.summary: The IPv4 mask associated with the route referred to by dwRouteProtocol.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.ulUpTime
member.summary: The time, in seconds, this MFE has been valid. This value starts from zero and is incremented until it reaches the ulTimeOut value, at which time the MFE is deleted.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.ulExpiryTime
member.summary: The time, in seconds, that remains before the MFE expires and is deleted. This value starts from ulTimeOut and is decremented until it reaches zero, at which time the MFE is deleted.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.ulTimeOut
member.summary: The total length of time, in seconds, that this MFE should remain valid. After the time-out value is exceeded, the MFE is deleted. This value is static.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.ulNumOutIf
member.summary: The number of outgoing interfaces that are associated with this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.fFlags
member.summary: Reserved. This member should be NULL.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved. This member should be NULL.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE.rgmioOutInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a table of outgoing interface statistics that are implemented as an array of structures.
